summary: Used air conditioner purchase website where the business buys used AC units from customers at good prices
architectural_notes: Admin dashboard currently has no authentication - publicly accessible by anyone who visits /admin route
known_issues: Admin dashboard navigation link not appearing in header menu for user

existing_features.title: Create a homepage that explains the business purchases used air conditioners from customers at competitive prices
Implement a form where customers can submit details about their used air conditioner including brand, model, age, condition, and contact information
Display pricing information or guidelines showing factors that influence the purchase price of used air conditioners
Implement a contact section with business contact information and operating hours

Design a professional visual theme with warm, trustworthy colors (earth tones, greens, or warm neutrals), modern sans-serif typography, and a clean layout that conveys reliability and environmental responsibility
Update the pricing information page to display all price values in Indian Rupees (₹) instead of dollars ($), including the example pricing tiers and any monetary amounts shown
Update any other pages that display currency amounts (home page, contact page, success page) to show Indian Rupees (₹) instead of dollars ($) for consistency across the entire application
Update the footer contact phone number list in the Layout component to display the three phone numbers: 889700937, 6304843930, and +917095510215, replacing the existing phone number entry
Create an admin dashboard page accessible at /admin route that displays all customer AC submissions in a table format showing brand, model, customer name, phone number, email, and submission date
Add a navigation link to the admin dashboard in the header navigation menu so the business owner can easily access customer submissions
Display the total count of customer submissions at the top of the admin dashboard page so the business owner knows how many customers have registered
Implement Internet Identity authentication protection for the admin dashboard route (/admin) so that only authenticated users can access customer submission data
Display a login button or prompt on the admin dashboard page when user is not authenticated, using the existing Internet Identity authentication system
Add a logout button in the header or admin dashboard that allows the authenticated business owner to sign out and clear their session
Add the Admin Dashboard navigation link to the mobile menu in the Layout component so it appears when users open the hamburger menu on mobile devices

new_feature_requests.summary: Create website for purchasing used air conditioners from customers
Create a backend data model to store air conditioner submissions with fields for brand, model, age, condition, customer name, phone, email, and submission timestamp
Change currency display from dollars to Indian Rupees (INR)
Update contact section with phone numbers: 889700937, 6304843930, +917095510215
Implement customer submission notification system so business owner knows when customers register their AC details
Create admin interface or system to view and manage customer AC submissions with contact details
Create a backend function to retrieve all customer AC submissions with their contact details (name, phone, email) so the business owner can view who has registered
Add authentication/login system to protect admin dashboard so only business owner can access customer submissions with credentials
Add a backend authentication check to verify that only authenticated principals can retrieve customer submission data via getAllSubmissions and getSubmission functions
Deploy the application to the Internet Computer mainnet so it is publicly accessible with a permanent canister URL that can be shared with customers
